name: Gravi-Fun
description:
You are an unnamed employee of U Corporation. You are tasked with making sure each Vortex Cube is properly deposited in the sparkling Vortex Fields. This is a puzzle game involving physics and gravity. Use your environment and your self to complete each puzzle. Try not to fall.

A and D = Left and Right

Spacebar = Change Personal Gravity

Escape = Return to Menu

Credits: Used some of the Unity default UI graphics to create visual design for Vortex Cube. I used the Official Unity Reference for questions about coding. Everything else was done by me.
